text: Asmodeus (/ˌæzməˈdiːəs/; Ancient Greek: Ἀσμοδαῖος, Asmodaios) or Ashmedai (/ˈæʃmɪˌdaɪ/; Hebrew: אַשְמְדּאָי, romanized: ʾAšmədāy; Arabic: آشماداي; see below for other variations) is a prince of demons in the legends of Solomon and the constructing of Solomon's Temple. == References == Category:Demons Category:Theology Category:Mythology
title: Asmodeus
